snippet.title: SIMULACRA 2 First Teaser
snippet.description:
A dead influencer.
An obsessed detective.
Three suspects.

Piece together the truth by going through the victim’s phone messages, videos, and social media. The follow up to the critically acclaimed SIMULACRA. Investigate a mysterious death with the only tool you have – the victim’s phone.

Coming soon to Steam, Android and iOS

Join us on discord!
https://discordapp.com/invite/playsimulacra

Wishlist us on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1011190/SIMULACRA_2/?fbclid=IwAR2v5-e5QHHIEHcj4_4YsX_Ea0PdMLsCASOzdHMBmwa4baurlo_WuOZ6dwY
